snippet: Step 1: Make bankers stop laundering dirty cash.
abstract: Op-Ed article by former federal agent Robert Mazur warns that banks that have been engaged in practice of money laundering for terrorist and drug trafficking organizations have faced relatively lenient penalties; contends only way to stop flow of dirty money is to get tough on bankers who help mask and transfer it around world.
lead_paragraph: Step 1: Make bankers stop laundering dirty cash.
